sqlMap.insert: insert tb_todo (title, event_date, description, completed, regdate, user_no) values (#title#, #eventDate#, #description#, 'N', now(), #user.no#)
sqlMap.select: select A.no, A.title, A.event_date as eventDate, A.description, A.completed, A.regdate, A.user_no as "user.no", B.name as "user.name" from tb_todo A, tb_user B where A.user_no = #value# and A.user_no = B.no order by no desc
